entry.title: BIP Draft: Atomic Cross Chain Transfer Protocol
entry.summary: A BIP for cross chain atomic transfers has been created due to popular demand. The previous version required a selector transaction based on if statements, while the new version only requires hash locking. The BIP can be found on GitHub and includes codes for OP_HASH160 OP_EQUAL_VERIFY [public key] OP_CHECKSIG and OP_HASH160 OP_EQUAL_VERIFY OP_N [public key 1] ... [public key m] OP_M OP_CHECK_MULTISIG.
